Module.Name: Sensor Shield
Module.Brief: Arduino(tm) shield to TinkerKit connection bridge.
Module.Overview: The Grove Base Shild is an Arduino(tm) compatible shield that has 22 Grove connectors on it. 7 of the connectors are connected to the A0-A5 shield pins. 13 of the connectors are connected to pins D2-D13. 1 connector is dedicated to D0-D1 for serial communication. The final is really not compatible with the Grove architecture at all; all 4 pins are connected to D10-D13 for SPI communication. This shield is a "top shield" in that other shields can not be plugged into it.
